item.title: Social Security’s COLA increase could jump to 2.8% next year. That still isn’t enough for people to get by.
item.description: The cost-of-living adjustment can’t keep up with the actual cost of living, as retirees’ costs climb.

item.title: PepsiCo revenue grows even as beverage volumes keep falling — and its stock rises
item.description: PepsiCo saw an earnings beat and an improved full-year outlook, even as beverage volumes in North America extended their long streak of declines.

item.title: Jamie Dimon says there’s a 30% chance of a correction. ‘I’m far more worried than others.’
item.description: The CEO of U.S. banking giant JPMorgan says most investors are not seeing the troubles that he is.
